pages.text: $(2)Bricked Furnace$() is a type of $(2)Furnace$() that functions mostly identical to the normal one. However, it can smelt certain items faster while consuming less coal.$(br2)It'll also collect Ash as a byproduct that can be used as dye or fuel.$(br)$(7)More information can be found inside the blocks GUI.

$(li)$(2)Fuel$() can be put into the top left.$(li)$(2)Ingredient$() into the center slot.$(li)$(2)Output$() will be placed on the right most slot.$(li)$(2)Ashes$() will drop down under the fuel. $(br)$(6)$(l)NOTE:$() Ashes can clog the furnace and stop it from working if backed up.$(br)$(7)Hopper functionality is identical to Furnace.
